sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
A new anatomie, or character of a Christian, or Round-head. Expressing his description, excellencie, happiness, and innocencie. Wherein may appear how far this blind world is mistaken in their unjust censures of him.
Imprimatur, John Downame.
[2], 13, [1] p.
Printed for Robert Leybourne and are to be sold at the Star, under Peters Church in Corn-hill, London : 1645.
Running title reads: A new character of a Christian or Round-head. Annotation on Thomason copy: "Octo: 17th". Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
